ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Hate Drops
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t think any one guild has taken enough samples to really know.  I think it s all luck at this point.  My guild has made in the neighborhood of 50
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 6 Mar 2000 srutkowski@... wrote:

> Hrm.... Actually, bard and warrior items are dropping a lot more than
> cleric items on my server. There are nights where the armor is falling out
> of the sky, but most nights there are very few drops. We cleared the
> entire zone several times, only to see 3 or 4 pieces drop outside of
> Maestro and Inny.

I don't think any one guild has taken enough samples to really
know. I think it's all luck at this point. My guild has made in the
neighborhood of 50 trips to hateplane. We've had everything from 3
straight trips without warrior armor, to "the night of 5 breastplates"
(Cleric, Warrior, Cleric, Cleric, Rogue).

> On Maestro: Any NPC is harder when they are duel wielding (pretty common
> knowledge), however, the last time we faced Maestro he was duel wielding
> the 6note and evensong. Let me tell you that he raped us repeatedly. I

* nods * Still, I would take Meastro duel wielding 6-note/evensong
over Maestro with nothing but the lute. He's harder, but the rewards are
worth it.

M - Wearer of Cleric BP #2 from "the night of 5 breastplates"

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
